Title: Qur'an
Dimensions: Folio H: 3 3/8 x W: 1 15/16 in. (8.5 x 5 cm)
Medium: ink and pigments on very thin parchment
Description: Walters manuscript W.574 is a miniature copy of the Qur'an copied in Iran by a certain Ahmad Isma'il in the 12th century AH/AD 18th century.
Keywords: Koran; Qur`an; Arabic; Book; Codex; Manuscript; Iran
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: al-Hajj Ahmad Isma'il
